core.title: NZ COVID Vaccination Finder
core.tagline: See every available vaccination booking slot near you.
core.disclaimerNotAGovWebsite: This is not an official Government website. To get vaccinated visit bookmyvaccine.nz

cancellationNotice.message: Remember to cancel your original booking if you have one at <0>https://bookmyvaccine.nz</0>

noticeList.title: Availability Is Not Guaranteed
noticeList.text: Keep in mind that walk-in locations listed might not necessarily have capacity available.

howToBook.title: How to Book
howToBook.stepOne: Find a location and time from the list below.
howToBook.stepTwo: Click on the Make a Booking button, this will take you to <0>bookmyvaccine.nz
howToBook.stepFour: When asked, search for your desired location and time.

modal.noBookingsAvailable: No bookings are available on this day :(

footer.message: If this site helped you please consider sharing
